Detailed Description

The goal of this class is to store the Version Manager Information RCS and show to user information of this Version Manager Information.

At construction of the object, the object create a RCS object if a project exists and manage the RCS. The currently version manager supported is CVS.

The item model show in a different color files modified, added, removed, or not in the repository. A tool tip show some information that the information manager supporte.
